articles.description: CORONATION STREET viewers have seen David Platt on their screens since his birth, but it seems he could be killed off in upcoming months.

articles.content:

articles.title: Gogglebox stars Sophie and Pete mock Meghan Markle on Disney doc - Entertainment Daily
articles.description: The former royal was narrating the documentary Elephant
articles.content:
Stars and fans of Gogglebox were left in tears after last night's episode, as they watched Meghan Markle announce the death of an elephant.

articles.title: Gemma Collins shows off her weight loss in skinny jeans as she dresses up for a weekend in lockdown - The Sun
articles.content:

articles.title: The Story Behind Britney Spears’s Iconic Oops!… I Did It Again Outfit - Vogue
articles.description: The music video’s stylist, Estee Stanley, tells Vogue how that famous red latex suit came to be.
articles.content: Heres an anniversary you may have missed: It has now been 20 years since the pop princess Britney Spears released her second studio album, Oops! I Did It Again. On that famed record, the queen of the 2000s churned out some of her biggest hits, such as Stronge… [+3313 chars]

articles.author: Conrad Duncan
articles.title: Hackers who stole data from entertainment law firm threaten to release Trump’s ‘dirty laundry’ - The Independent
articles.description: Criminal group demands £35m in ransom over supposedly damaging stolen documents
articles.content:
Hackers who have stolen data from a major entertainment law firm have threatened to release Donald Trumps dirty laundry unless they receive $42m (£35m) in ransom.
The criminal group hacked the law firm Grubman Shire Meiselas & Sacks last week and release… [+9633 chars]

articles.title: Cats: Andrew Lloyd Webber appears to criticise James Corden’s ‘unfunny’ performance - The Independent
articles.description: Musical’s original composer was not happy with certain aspects of the box office flop
articles.content:
